alert.note: Alert for Kittitas Valley; Yakima Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 2:41PM PST until January 06 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze to up to a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Kittitas Valley and Yakima Valley. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel through these areas will be compounded by the snow that has already fallen and the resultant road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.
